thread.title: Apple Watch Series 3 with glass-film touch display to ship in second half of 2017
thread.title_full: Apple Watch Series 3 with glass-film touch display to ship in second half of 2017

author: Christian Zibreg
title: Apple Watch Series 3 with glass-film touch display to ship in second half of 2017
text:
A third-generation Apple Watch is expected to use a different display technology than existing models, based on a glass-film technology versus than touch-on-lens panels utilized on Apple Watch Series 2 and glass-on-glass (two pieces of glass) solution used for the original Apple Watch models. Shipments of the tentatively named Apple Watch Series 3 are expected to start in the second half [â€¦]

_
